quote: I've had a perfectly wonderful evening, but this wasn't it
author: Groucho Marx

quote: There is nothing wrong with you that reincarnation won't cure
author: Jack E. Leonard

quote: If your brains were dynamite there wouldn't be enough to blow your hat off
author: Timequake Vonnegut

quote: I desire that we be better strangers
author: As You Like It, William Shakespeare

quote: I misjudged you... You're not a moron. You're only a case of arrested development
author: The Sun Also Rises, Ernest Hemingway

quote: I'll explain and I'll use small words so that you'll be sure to understand, you worthog faced buffoon
author: The Princess Bride

quote: My bathmat means more to me than you
author: Swimming with Sharks

quote: You are a sad strange little man, and you have my pity
author: Toy Story

quote: You clinking, clattering collection of caliginous junk!
author: The Wizard of Oz

quote: Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries!
author: Monty Python

quote: You look like an old mop
author: Bridesmaids
